mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders(ono, rdate,rno , rtime, price, totalprice,oname, housecode, address1, address2, method, phone, request, state, mno) values (orders_seq.nextval ,sysdate ,#{rno}, sysdate ,#{price } ,#{totalprice },#{oname} ,#{housecode},#{address1},#{address2} ,#{method }, #{phone }, #{request }, #{state }, #{mno })
mapper.select: select ono, rdate, rtime, price, totalprice, oname, housecode, address1, address2,method,phone, request, state, mno from (select ono, rdate, rtime, price, totalprice, oname, housecode, address1, address2,method,phone, request, state, mno from orders where mno = #{mno } order by ono desc) where rownum = 1

select ono, rdate, rno, rtime, price, totalprice, oname, housecode, address1, address2,method,phone, request, state, mno from (select ono, rdate, rno, rtime, price, totalprice, oname, housecode, address1, address2,method,phone, request, state, mno from orders where ono = #{ono } order by ono desc) where rownum = 1

select o.ono, o.rdate, o.rtime , o.totalprice, o.housecode, o.address1, o.address2, o.method, o.phone, o.request, o.state, o.mno ,m.menuno , m.price, m.title, m.spiciness, m.rno from menu m, orders o, orders_detail od where od.menuno = m.menuno and od.ono = o.ono and o.mno = #{mno }

select o.ono, o.rdate, o.rtime, o.price, o.totalprice, o.mno ,m.menuno , m.price , m.title, m.explanation, m.spiciness, m.file1, m.thumb from menu m, orders o, orders_detail od where od.menuno = m.menuno and od.ono = o.ono and o.ono = #{ono }

select o.ono, o.rdate, o.rtime , o.totalprice, o.housecode, o.address1, o.address2, o.method, o.phone, o.request, o.state, o.mno ,m.menuno , m.price, m.title, m.spiciness, m.rno from menu m, orders o, orders_detail od where od.menuno = m.menuno and od.ono = o.ono and o.rno = #{rno}

select ono, rdate, rtime , totalprice, housecode, address1, address2,method, phone, request, state, mno ,menuno ,price, title, spiciness, rno from (select o.ono, o.rdate, o.rtime , o.totalprice, o.housecode,o.address1, o.address2, o.method, o.phone, o.request, o.state, o.mno ,m.menuno , m.price, m.title, m.spiciness, m.rno from menu m, orders o, orders_detail od where od.menuno = m.menuno and od.ono = o.ono and o.mno = #{mno } order by o.ono desc) where rownum = 1;
select ONO,RDATE,RTIME,PRICE,ADDRESS1,ADDRESS2,METHOD,PHONE,REQUEST,STATE,MNO,HOUSECODE,ONAME,RNO,TOTALPRICE from orders where rno = #{rno } order by ono desc
select sum(totalprice) from orders where rno = #{rno } and TO_CHAR(RDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') = #{date }
mapper.update: update orders set state = 1 where ono = #{ono }
